channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MO

item.title: Report E-2024040116
item.description:
Report E-2024040116

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-09T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-15
  • City: SPRINGFIELD
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ESTES EXPRESS LINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Environmental Works was dispatched to the site. Upon the contractorâ€™s arrival, personnel observed that the released material impacted two areas measuring 1ft-by-8ft and 1ft-by-1ft of the trailer floor and estimated that one (1) gallon of material was released due to load shift damaging three (3) 2-gallon metal pails. Environmental Works personnel deployed absorbents and neutralizer to the impacted areas. The spent material and impacted debris was containerized into six (6) 55-gallon poly drums. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location prior to the contractor demobilization. The generated waste will remain onsite for the ESTES DGRM team to coordinate disposal.

item.title: Report X-2024040036
item.description:
Report X-2024040036

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-04T15:13:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-18
  • City: MAPLEWOOD
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: X-2024040036: attachment Name:Brilliant Finish Car Wash SDS 08-09-2018.pdf X-2024040117: THE SHIPMENT WAS DISCOVERED LEAKING DURING SORT OPERATIONS. THE OUTER BOX WAS MARKED WITH A SURFACE LTD QTY LABEL. INNER CONTENTS: GRIOTS GARAGE INTERIOR DETAILER (TOTALLY LEAKED ITS CONTENTS 0.65L), GRIOTS BRILLIANT FINISH CAR WASH Total in bottle 1.89L (LOOSE TOP). ALL REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM AND HELD PENDING DISPOSITION FROM THE SHIPPER
